sentence: the user should see "{string}" details on the page
description: checks if the details are visible on the page.

variables.name: name
variables.description: The logical name of the element to check.

variables.name: table
variables.description: The table containing the details to check.

gherkinExample:
When the user should see "User" details on the page
| Name | John |
| Age | 30 |
